thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: MCI Resolves To Issue Series P Bonds

author: Reuters Editorial
title: MCI Resolves To Issue Series P Bonds
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - MCI CAPITAL SA:
* SAID ON MONDAY THE COMPANY RESOLVED TO ISSUE UP TO 37,000 SERIES P BONDS OF TOTAL NOMINAL VALUE OF UP TO 37 MLN ZLOTYS IN PRIVATE OFFER
* THE SHARE ISSUE PRICE TO BE 986 ZLOTYS EACH * SET MATURITY DATE OF SERIES P BONDS FOR MARCH 1, 2021 * SERIES P BONDS TO BEAR VARIABLE INTEREST BASED ON WIBOR 6M INCREASED BY MARGIN OF 4.0% WITH INTEREST PAID EVERY 6 MONTHS
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
